bcl:text: WHEREAS Canadians are involved in reassessing the Constitution of Canada;
AND WHEREAS the Constitution of Canada is the Supreme Law of Canada;
AND WHEREAS constitutional amendment has an impact on all British Columbians;

THEREFORE HER MAJESTY, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Assembly 
  of the Province of British Columbia, enacts as follows:

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Referendum to precede resolution for constitutional change

bcl:text.#text:
The government must not introduce a motion for a resolution of the Legislative 
  Assembly authorizing an amendment to the Constitution of Canada unless a referendum has first 
  been conducted under the  with respect to the subject matter of that 
  resolution.
